name: Brown & Sons Junk Removal and Hauling (Dara Viselli)
name_original: Brown & Sons Junk Removal and Hauling (Dara Viselli)
description:
Welcome to Brown & Sons Junk Removal and Hauling. Play as Jackin Brown Jr and take control of a front-end loader to help remove human garbage from your city, and put it in the dumpster where it belongs. You can choose to either focus on speed and clear fascists off the streets as fast as possible, or scoop up as many of them as you can for bigger combos. Whatever you do, don't forget to yeehaw.

Attributions:
